Articles.Content:
> 
> 
> 18 hours ago, linuxgurugamer said:
> 
> 
> I've reached out to [@YANFRET](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/90547-yanfret/) about adopting this, but haven't heard back yet
> 
> 
> 
> 
> It's a great mod, but needs some work.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Also, as of now, the Procedural Fairings is broken on 1.12, causing crash to desktop issues
> 

The ModFather strikes back! Also just because it's on my mind from the KSP 10 year video, thank you for all you do [@linuxgurugamer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129964-linuxgurugamer/)

> 
> 
> 11 hours ago, MajorLeaugeRocketScience said:
> 
> 
> The ModFather strikes back! Also just because it's on my mind from the KSP 10 year video, thank you for all you do [@linuxgurugamer](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/129964-linuxgurugamer/)
> 

Don't hold your breath, I haven't heard from him yet

Let's hope we get a response soon, if not then idk if we should close this thread.

I miss this mod ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")

> 
> 
> 2 hours ago, Ashiepoppy said:
> 
> 
> Let's hope we get a response soon, if not then idk if we should close this thread.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> I miss this mod ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif ":(")
> 

I never heard back, and since the license won’t allow me to adopt, I’ve dropped this endeavor .

Specifically, this includes parts from **CXG2827 - CXaerospace Station Parts** which is under ARR.  I contacted the author of that mod, and he was unwilling to change the license, the limited terms he offered would have been difficult to follow.

Sad, it is a nice mod, and I had already done a lot of work on it before I heard back

**Edited <time datetime="2022-05-22T00:18:04Z" title="05/22/2022 12:18  AM" data-short="2 yr">May 22, 2022</time> by linuxgurugamer**

I think it's best that this mod be put to rest.

RIP: CMES

2015-2019
Basically, I say this thread be closed

> 
> 
> On 5/21/2022 at 8:10 PM, linuxgurugamer said:
> 
> 
> I never heard back, and since the license won’t allow me to adopt, I’ve dropped this endeavor .
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Specifically, this includes parts from **CXG2827 - CXaerospace Station Parts** which is under ARR.  I contacted the author of that mod, and he was unwilling to change the license, the limited terms he offered would have been difficult to follow.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Sad, it is a nice mod, and I had already done a lot of work on it before I heard back
> 

Would it be possible to just remove those parts from the mod?  I'm not very familiar, so I don't know how extensive they are.

> 
> 
> 5 hours ago, JonnyOThan said:
> 
> 
> Would it be possible to just remove those parts from the mod?  I'm not very familiar, so I don't know how extensive they are.
> 

Anything’s possible, but not something I’m going to do, sorry.

‘There are plenty of other great parts mods available, no need to spend that kind of time on this.

Sorry
